page.title: 01Rolling farm lands Suffolk
page.content: The location shown is one of high grade agricultural land with arable farms covering most of the area. Farms are large many small fields being merged, to accomodate sizeable farm maachinery, with small building replaced by large barns and grain stores. Where hedges have been taken out, cover for game has been replaced by smal woods and trees planted in hedgerows. Livestock farming has declined, and only sheep and pigs are now kept in this area. With the intensive mechanisation of agriculture, people that live in this locality nd work on the land are in the minority, as most who reside here, commute to nearby towns, being employed in many trades and professions. A number of retired people have made their homes in the area as the proximity of country towns
